title: TUIse API
content:
She's alive!
The TUIse restful API, based on the openapi standard, can be found here:

**[http://api.tuise.eu/docs/](http://api.tuise.eu/docs/)**

(OpenAPI Standard info: [github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification](https://github.com/OAI/OpenAPI-Specification/blob/master/versions/2.0.md))
